about-me.name: I'm Ahmed Mohamed
about-me.title: Fullstack web engineer | UI/UX Designer
about-me.my-start: In 2018, I took the plunge into the world of custom Discord bots, immersing myself in the intricate realm of coding and web development. As time marched on, I found myself fortunate to craft software for a diverse array of clients.
about-me.my-foucs: Currently, my primary focus revolves around crafting products for clients at Mostaql. During my free time, I delve into exploring new concepts, trends, and emerging technologies.
about-me.my-life: When I’m not at the computer, you'll often find me immersed in music, socializing with friends, or indulging in some anime watching. It's a refreshing break from the digital world.
